Venue Finder and Booking Service

Team up with our On Purpose event and conference venue finder services to bring your event vision to life.

Plan your event

Nail your event venue

Plan your event

We bring the imagination, worldwide networks, deep local knowledge and contract know-how to save you time, money and all the headaches in finding the right venue for your brand, your event theme and your budget.

Join 100's of companies committed to greener events
Plan your event

Venue sourcing

Uncovering the best-kept secrets in town, from hidden gems to iconic landmarks, our team has a nose for discovering the hottest, newest and eco-friendly event venues around. Whether it’s a corporate meeting, conference, exhibition or gala dinner, we understand that the right venue is the cornerstone of a successful event. So why settle for the ordinary when we can help you achieve the extraordinary?

Finding it yourself makes a lot of work and headaches searching online directories or handling multiple venue proposals, RFPs, contracts and payments. With our expertise, lightning-fast venue finding service and jedi negotiation skills we’ll locate the perfect space to make your event truly unforgettable.

Group accommodation

Our event and conference venue finders will book the perfect venue and accommodation combination to create a seamless experience for your group event. Budget, mid-level or luxury, city or regional, we’ll search our extensive global directory of hotel, meeting and event venue spaces that adopt sustainable practices.

But that’s not all. We know that managing group accommodation and rooming allocations can be a headache, which is why we’ve developed smart delegate registration solutions that take care of all the complexities. No more juggling spreadsheets and emails – we’ve got you covered from start to finish, so you can sit back, relax, and enjoy a stress-free event.

Let’s find the right venue for your next event

Speak to an expert

Our event planners’ promise

Fast, effective, world-class, global venue finding services

Take care of everything – site visits, contract negotiation and payment terms

Nail your vision and align with your corporate values

Secure the best deal with our buying power and Jedi negotiation skills

Offer flexibility – venue sourcing only, or full end-to-end event management

Leave your attendees in awe

Sustainable event venues to inspire you

Lush gardens

Gardens By The Bay, Singapore. The Privy Garden at Hampton Court Palace, London, Kew Gardens, London.

Iconic landmarks

The Burj Khalifa, Dubai. Casino de Monte Carlo. Sydney Opera House.

Grand Galleries, palaces and museums

Hotel Salomon de Rothschild, Paris. The Westin Palace, Madrid. Royal Mansour Marrakech

Modern wonders

The Crystal, London. Te Pae Christchurch Convention Centre, NZ. Swisstech Convention Centre, Lake Geneva.

Cool spaces

La Lanterna, Rome. Mona, Tasmania. Frameless, London.

Spectacular vistas

Aurora basecamp, Iceland. Hamilton Island, The Great Barrier Reef. Magic Camp, The Arabian Desert.

We’re world-class venue finders with global reach across the Asia Pacific region, Europe, Africa and the Middle East.

Product Launches and Special Events

On Purpose events is a sustainable event management company. We help businesses, associations and government on a path toward carbon neutral meetings and events with lasting positive impact. Together we can create a better future, one event at a time.
